nodes.text: Devan is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on June 19, 2003 and took the form of a biography of Jedi Master Devan For'deschel, including her new appointment as Mistress of Lightsabers at the Almas Academy. This biography was accompanied by a number of quotations from For'deschel on issues relating to her role and the ongoing Clone Wars.
